website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality elevated dog bed specializing in durability, comfort, and efficiency while keeping your dog cool on the warmest days.
pros: Made of heavy-duty durable fabric that is surprisingly lightweight and portable
Customers love how easy it folds up when they want to store it out of sight
Comes with a carrying case for easy traveling
cons: The fabric is not chew proof
some buyers complained that their dog was able to poke holes in the cot

customer_reviews.title: Great material and construction
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large for my 85 lbs. GSD. The material and build of this cot is pretty sturdy. I just wish the size large is bigger than what it is.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: good structure with major flaws
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdy metal construction and foldable legs. My dog seems to be genuinely interested in trying it out as soon as I put it up. But there are two major flaws that I wish the manufacture would improve: - the fabric is of poor quality. In fact it is flimsy with thin layer of plastic backing. Not strong, and not comfortable for dogs to sit on. - the curved/round feet/support makes it very easy to tilt when dog gets on/off over the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Zagpoint

customer_reviews.title: Pregnancy brain friendly.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large for my German Shepherd puppy who is huge! I am also pregnant and having something with no assembly required and just take out the bag and place on the floor was so easy for me! I keep this in the shade so she has a area to sit that is a lot more comfortable for her. The bag is nice for when we are going camping and visiting her uncle’s house. It is very light and pregnant brain friendly. Definitely want to order again and recommend it to friends. Saves me time and hassle compared to other brands I ordered! Why can’t they all be this easy!
customer_reviews.author: May li

customer_reviews.title: Great Build, Picky dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my German Shepard and he still prefers the floor. The product itself is strong and durable, I was able to get him to lay on it a couple times and the material is really strong. The bonus is that it folds up for storing it and it comes with the bag which is a plus. I will try throwing a blanket it on it see if my dog might like that more. I do recommend this dog bed if your dog is not picky, if he/she is picky then look for something more plushy/soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Best bed for busy dog!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is super well made and it is light and portable. We use it at home to give our Malinois puppy (who runs on atomic energy) a well defined place where to lie down while we have dinner at night. Now she goes to her bed cot as soon as I serve dinner without me having to direct her there. Next I plan to take the bed cot with me to puppy classes so that she can have a place to lie down on while waiting her turn. The bed cot is super easy to fold and unfold and with the carry bag, it's a breeze to take it along.
customer_reviews.author: Marielle Pariseau

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Cot!
customer_reviews.text: This cot is perfect! We got it so our dog could sit outside when it was hot without being on the hot ground. It arrived and within a few seconds was out of the box and very easily set up - the hardest part was opening the box! :) The storage bag is nice in case we want to travel with some of the dog toys and a blanket or towel. We tried to lure Fiona to get on the cot by putting a fluffy blanket and towel for her to lay on. She loved it. She picked up a bunny toy and layed right down for a nibble. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: G.Honey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and professional construction
customer_reviews.text: We bought the large, and this will be plenty of room for our Silky as well as our Rottweiler/English Bulldog mix. The Silky has claimed it already. :-) It arrived safe and sound with suuuper easy set up. It arrived in a large box and slides right out. Comes in a slip cover which would make it great for traveling and keeping the pups out of the dirt for when we are outside and they want to chill with us. It's very sturdy and the large has a center brace as well. It doesn't wobble around or buckle under weight. Holds up to 100lbs. Nice job on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra m.

customer_reviews.title: Large is Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product but the largest they have is too small and really should be a Medium. My Sam (German Shepherd in the photo) is only 6 months old and 65 pounds and is already too big for it.
customer_reviews.author: arieliondotcom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, no assembly required, folds and stores easily
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy, "chew proof", no assembly required, easy to store especially with enclosed bag to keep it clean and prevent damage. Also purchased larger version which is just as good as the small one. Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bessette

customer_reviews.title: The fastener came loose and now the cot is useless. Request Return information from the seller
customer_reviews.text: Only had this item 2 weeks. My dog weight Approximately 50 pounds. He slept on this 3 to 5 times the most. The fastener came loose and now the cot is useless. Request Return information from the seller. Day the seller wanted it returned the next day. Received the return label two days later. Will never buy This product again. If I could give it an no star I would.
customer_reviews.author: evierodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Needs stronger hinges
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with it until it broke. Concept is AWESOME but the hinges are not sturdy. It popped off after about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Carebear

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! My husband and I ride motocross, and we take our pup with us everywhere! There are quite a few dog cots available on Amazon, but I we specifically needed one we could travel with. Out puppachino has always been content with a spot on the grass, but she's extra pumped about her new cot! She's just a lil 4 month old, 25lb string bean at the moment, but she'll grow into her Large cot by time she's a full size doggo!
customer_reviews.author: Jay M

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my dogs and they are tearing. Have not even tried to clean them. They are like shredding...
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Bed!
customer_reviews.text: My 56 lb pit bull loves her new cot / bed! She fits perfect in the large. Its super light and portable and has a carrying case. The bed really is a great product! So glad I found this. She has a cooleroo that scratches my floors up so bad and the material drops and the bed frame comes apart after a few months. I found myself buying her a new bed once or twice every year. I think this one will last a while! Great for travelling too, can t wait to pack up the truck and head out of town with it! Will give another review in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Not entirely as pictured
customer_reviews.text: When I saw that the description said "foldable," and the picture seems to indicate that it folds in half, I was disappointed to find that only the legs fold up to go into the case. Because it doesn't fold in half, it is heavy and awkward to carry. I purchased it for training as a "place board," and will use it for that, but was hoping that it would be more portable. On the plus side, it seems to be very sturdy. As for comfort, I don't know because I haven't tried it out myself. However, my dog doesn't seem to mind sitting there.
customer_reviews.author: mstx2co

customer_reviews.title: Giga Medium Pet Bed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the medium sized elevated pet in tan. It is large enough for both of our smallish dogs. It is sturdy but light and easy to move around. Both dogs have been on it and seem to enjoy the bed. It will be used for camping. My only negative is the difficult way the legs fold. Two of the four hinges are very stiff. I needed to wear gripper gloves to move them into the open position so as not to pinch my fingers. All-in-all, I like the bed and seemingly, so do our dogs :)
customer_reviews.author: Scootermcp

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a warning
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if this warning label matters to others, but any possibility of lead or other toxic chemicals is a deal breaker for me. Imported from China. Surprise. I’ll be returning it. If that doesn’t matter to you, I can say that the product framing seems sturdy, the folding legs lock into place and it’s easy to set up and take down. The bag will be a help as it is still rather bulky when folded. The fabric seems to fit a bit too loosely, and seems cheap, but I’m not keeping it to test that out. Back to square one. It was a nice idea.
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: Great bed but didn't work for one of my dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the beds and the fact that they fold up. I bought one for my German shepherd and one for my pit bull. They both loved the beds but it took less than a few hours for my pit to dig a hole right through the canvas - but then he will destroy anything that belongs to him. My shepherd loves the bed and does well with it. I am considering ordering the protective cover but not sure it will work. Please note this is NOT the companies fault, their product is great for dogs just not mine since I have tried several products and there is not one that is tough enough to survive him.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Solid, stable, and comfortable for my pup
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 10 month old, hyperactive, 85lbs GSD. He sends kennel crates flying when released, but this cot on carpet doesn’t budge. He leaps onto it so it’s solidly built and there’s no center bar at the fold to bump into. Only 4 stars because the joints and hinges are all riveted so it’s unlikely the cover can be replaced. Update 12/12/2019 I found that Kong makes a dog bed that is the perfect size to attach to this bed using tie wraps. This provides more comfort for my dog and more protection for the cot. If it gets trashed, it’s easy to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Kroot

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy to unfold, comes with bag and it’s large!
customer_reviews.text: I love that there is nothing to assemble, it’s high quality and large! My sister said it’s be too big for my small cat, but I told her to wait and see. My cat walked right up to it after I pulled it out the shipping box and its bag (nice bonus) and lied down. Sooo cute! She loves it. Didn’t even wait for me to put her blanket on it. It’s perfect. I’ll be getting a few of these for Christmas gifts to my family who love their pets, too. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed for our 75lb pit bull Mag, to replace a bigger bed at work. Old bed was a little too big and always in the way and wasn’t collapsible. This smaller version even though doesn’t fold but legs fold in and fit between fridge and desk, getting out of way when Mag is not at work. He fits on it just fine as pic shows it. (He doesn’t work all day though!)
customer_reviews.author: Icicle4

customer_reviews.title: Best Cot Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 6 different cots over the years. Some are framed with PVC and some metal. Each type have ended up with the frame bending or breaking in half. This one is is constructed like an army cot which gives it that all important middle support. The bedding material is thick and sturdy. Best yet......NO ASSEMBLY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: I returned it
customer_reviews.text: the small one it's NOT FOLDABLE!... it is like carrying a big table.
customer_reviews.author: J. BOLIVAR

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Portable, and a must have for pet owners!
customer_reviews.text: This pet cot is made from high quality material and feels super durable. It comes with a nice bag with handles, enabling you to efficiently take the cot on trips. You can even take the cot to the park, enabling your pet to rest without worrying about it getting all dirty from laying on the ground! The frame mechanism feels sturdy, and the fabric is soft yet ample strong to hold even a large pet. For the portability and the quality, this cot was a great purchase! Every animal deserves a nice place to sleep and you can rest assured, your pet will feel safe and sound sleeping on this cot.
customer_reviews.author: flyindodobird

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Got one for each of my two dogs so they don’t have to lay on the hot concrete patio all summer. They love them! My dogs get in and out of our swimming pool all day and I like that the beds dry quickly and don’t hold the wet dog smell. It’s really convenient that they fold up so I can tuck them out of the way when we aren’t using them. They were expensive, but I think they are worth it to because they have all the features I was looking for - XL, heavy nylon fabric, and they fold.
customer_reviews.author: Elledog10

customer_reviews.title: Portability 2 paws up
customer_reviews.text: 2 paws up from my fur baby! I chose to buy this one for quick store and go to move from one room to another and for portability purposes I love it! It is definitely on the higher end cost wise and there are other ones on amazon that are more cost efficient! But for our needs this was our best choice and we just took it out of the box and it was ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Super durable and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I got this pet cot for my dog to sleep in. It's super durable and no assembly required, which is great. You can also fold it and put out of the way, when not in use, or for travel. I put my dogs favorite blanket on it and he sleeps there all the time now! Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alysandra

customer_reviews.title: I love this cot
customer_reviews.text: I love this cot. More importantly, our dog Maddie likes it. No assembly required--great! Sturdy for our large dog--great! Raised off the ground and comfortable for her bones and joints--great!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Minnick

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for training. Perfect for camping!
customer_reviews.text: We got the medium Giga ten when our Standard Doodle was 4 months to “place” her. Worked right away. We “place” her on her Giga Tent when we have meals or when she gets over excited with company. She quickly obeys. It was perfect for camping. As we sat around the campfire she rested on her bed. In photo Molly is exhausted from swimming all day in the lake. It is even sturdy enough for the kids to sit with her. Now she is 9 months and 60 lbs and the medium seems too small. We need to order her a larger bed so she can stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Joy

customer_reviews.title: Bevo's Place
customer_reviews.text: We are training our new puppy and this makes the perfect 'PLACE' for him. After the weather get cooler it will be perfect for him because he is a mini Auzzie and we know how hot it can be here in Texas. We love our new Elevated Pet Cot. This service from this company was also awesome.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA HOGAN

customer_reviews.title: It ripped at the seems easily. I would NOT recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.text: This product did not last our large dogs >1 month. It ripped at the seems easily. I would NOT recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: RandomHouse

customer_reviews.title: Doggy Cot is a winner with our Doodle
customer_reviews.text: Cot came well packaged and was surprised by canvas carrying case quality! Expected Cot to be of quality and material, and was not disappointed! Easy to give 5 stars for this product! Our Goldendoodle gives it 6 paws 🐾🐾🐾!
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Bare Metal was rusted when arrived, Returned
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box to find the bed hinge braces, and rivets were all rusted. Not sure if the box had been in a damp environment at some point. Does not matter, because the product would have rusted quickly, especially when I was going to use it in Florida. Humidity would have certainly rusted it in quick order. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Knasel

customer_reviews.title: Free replacement for damaged cot.. excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Third update: seller provides excellent customer service and reached out to offer a brand new replacement, so I'm hopeful this one will hold up better than the first one. This is an updated review... I received this item on 5 March and by 21 March, my 60 pound Belgian Malinois had put holes with her nails from getting up. For the price, I would expect this product to last at least a few years before showing wear and tear like this. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ESP

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Dogs love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 100# Great Pyrennes and now they both fight over the bed. Its so great, allowing air flow around and under the cot so my dogs are comfortable as long as they are out in the hot Florida sun. I am very upset. I am on social security and now I have to budget to buy a second one because they both want to be on the cot and Alexander as you can see will not share. Our dogs love this product as much as we do. A 5 outa 5 no question
customer_reviews.author: William K.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cot so that my dog can have a bed to lay on if we go outside or to the park. When I got it I found that it assembled very easily. It quickly folds out into a bed and even comes with a convenient bag to store it in. It is very convenient to have. In addition to being easy to use, it is also very comfortable for my dog to lay on. It is a great value for the price and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy...
customer_reviews.text: I think our GSD, Belle, approves. It took her a little while to get used to it but she’s finally warming up to it. We live in Puerto Rico and as you can imagine it’s always summer. It is very 🥵 HOT! Note: Belle is an aggressive chewer and one night she went to town on one of the corners. So we had to put a doggie mat until she got used to it. Petty durable fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: SO LOUD and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. The first time our dog got on this bed the loud, thunderous noise it made scared him to death! He ran away and wouldn’t come near it again and we don’t blame him! His paw punctured a hole right through it too. Cheap, not thoughtfully designed, not durable and way too loud!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Noisy material
customer_reviews.text: Not great leg locking, and cot material is kinda loud when dog moves around on it.(especially at night when we r all trying to go to sleep!)I have another brand of cot that I love but thought this one with folding legs would be better for camper trips?(paid WAY LESS for the other)She has poked 2 small holes in this one I’m guessing from her short nails?? Her other cot has a mess like material in the middle with no problem in a year of EVERYDAY use.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy-to-use Cot for Pets!
customer_reviews.text: The Giga Tent elevated cot in size large is perfect for my 65-pound Goldendoodle to climb and relax on in the family room, kitchen or screened-in porch. It is extremely sturdy, allows air to flow above and below the cot, and folds for convenience. No assembly required!! I love the variety of colors, too. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Slavens

customer_reviews.title: Loved it for first year, then ripped out
customer_reviews.text: Hello, We purchased this in March 2019 and loved it. Portable, versatile and seemed durable until last week when our dog went to lay down on it and it ripped along the seams of the fabric and then extended into the center, so it is now not usable. We alwys brought the bed inside, so it never was outside during the rain or inclement weather. Certainly hoping to get more than 15 months of use out of it, for the price we paid. Now looking for an alternatove for our pup!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Very easy - no assemble and strong
customer_reviews.text: Exceedingly well designed and I appreciate the simplicity of the set up right out of the box. I really like that as I’ve had good cots before that have assembly and are a pain for traveling. Love the soccer mom dog cot approach! I think I will get the protector for the cot as my puppies are still in chew mode - they chewed at material on previous cots.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Burkard

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both medium and large for our dogs. I purchased them a few days before our camping trip. I was looking for a foldable bed which could be easily transported and without tools required to setup. This was definitely something I was looking for - would recommend it to those looking for easy, durable and tools free setup.
customer_reviews.author: MisterQ

customer_reviews.title: Great for Training
customer_reviews.text: This cot is great for training you pooch to go to a spot, auto sitting and training them to stay. Folds out easily and goes back into its carrying case easily as well. Well made as our 60 pound Pit would tell you if she could speak.
customer_reviews.author: tkdjim

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: My two doxies love this bed! I have to keep them in an exercise pen while I am out during the day. I put this in the pen and they quikly go in and get on the bed and are set. Its easy to set up and very durable. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lee Vymetal

customer_reviews.title: Best pet bed or best pet bed ever?!?
customer_reviews.text: Camping is fun for the whole family, but sometimes the furriest members get overlooked. Well, GigaTent has helped out again. The Elevated Pet Cot available from GigaTent allows your pet to relax in comfort, off the muddy ground and above the pests that are lurking to make your pet miserable with their bites. Add your favorite pet bed or pillow and GigaTent has allowed you to construct a luxury camping suite that you and your pet will appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Doehrmann

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves it immediately
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our doodle on camping trips. Needed collapsible bed to fit easily in the trailer or truck for both trailer camping and tent camping trips. Wanted her to have comfy place to sit with us by the fire. It opens and closes super easy, and she loved it immediately. So glad we spent a little more to get one easily transportable and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best!
customer_reviews.text: Took my 85 lb Dobe a little getting used to due to the canvas sound under foot, however I covered with a small throw rug and now we both love it! The quality is good and very stable. I hope it is able to stand up to daily use. If so, I will order it again as gifts for friends/family and when mine wears out. The convenience of a fold-able design makes this unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move and store
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and move around. It’s not a five star because I have no idea how to change the cover and appears to be difficult to do so. We started seeing some wear and tear from my dogs jumping on it. Would be great if I can find a replacement cover and change it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Wei-Chun V Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Bed for Camping Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. As shown. Easy to fold out/in. Now, convincing my dog to lie on this instead of the dirt is a different story. Still working on that after three camping trips!
customer_reviews.author: portermom

customer_reviews.title: Good night!
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be a home run, sturdy, comfy, works nicely. Only have had it a couple of days and we find our puppy using it immediately!!. Will update in a month or so!
customer_reviews.author: E. T.

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction. Cheap materials.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all, you can see from the pic it's not even level , and it'll pinch the dog. Sent it back, because after my initial review, dude said he'd make it right, he didn't, Cabela's sells a great one for 10 more bucks, totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Portland OR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our German Shepherd Puppy
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 month old GSD loves it. We use it mainly as his place cot when working with him and commands but he does lay on it sometimes. I will say it didn’t hold up to him being bored and his sharp teeth but still works. Very sturdy and easy to fold up.
customer_reviews.author: Rocknerd

customer_reviews.title: Dog wouldn't use it
customer_reviews.text: Our dog wouldn't consider using it. I spoke to the seller and we came to a compromise. I would donate the pet bed to the local animal hospital and he would reimburse me half of the cost. I can't review the product per se, because we didn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: San D. Hasselman

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it!!!  Can't get much better than that :)
customer_reviews.text: The storage bag is an unnecessary feature. I re-homed mine. Selling without the bag would most likely reduce cost to consumers like myself. I can't think of any good reason why I would need the storage bag. The cot is wonderful and very easy to unfold and fold.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L. Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: It is made out of strong material and folds in half which makes it easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: I got this pet cot for my Dogs birthday and he absolutely loves it!! I even have a hard time getting him to come off. It is made out of strong material and folds in half which makes it easy to transport. The carry case is awesome since it protects the cot when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Aberaham Y Holland

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough to last
customer_reviews.text: Our dog made a small tear in the fabric after 8 months of use, and that small tear quickly turned into a large tear that his leg goes through. Its disappointing, as he really loved this and it seemed like a very sturdy product at first.
customer_reviews.author: Megster

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Felt bad about my dog sleeping on the cold tent floor, so I got him this cot. This plus a $19.oo fluffy pad from Tractor Supply and, even on the coldest of nights in the tent, he's on top of the world. I really like this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricy, but nice product
customer_reviews.text: It took a while before my dog was comfortable using it, but she loves it now. I wish it would fold up flatter and had a clasp to keep it closed, but the bag is nice to have. As nice as this product is, I do think it’s overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Easy carry, well made
customer_reviews.text: My trainer recommended your product to me. My new puppy LOVES it..took to it right away. The cot is easy to fold up and place in the carry bag to take to training class. I may just have to buy another one for upstairs when we are relaxing and watching TV. We have a Golden Retriever, so it was recommended that I buy the large size...glad I did. She will grow up to be a larger breed dog and this large size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Holden

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early. Already assembled Seemed very sterdy. The dogs liked jumping on it and laying on it. Easy travel bed and easy to move around the house, also can be used in many different situations. We could take it on our camping trips, and now both our dogs have a bed off the floor of where they want to lay down.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: Folds up into half the size in a nice bag made with the same coated canvas material, for transport or storage. Good for warm weather or boarding facility.
customer_reviews.author: Skidoodle

customer_reviews.title: The small is plenty big for a 65lb dog!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. We use it for traveling with our dog. She loves it. It is easy to carry and easy to store since it folds up flat. I have a 65lb dog and ordered the small. She fits on it very well with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two months
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old puppy was afraid of it at first because it makes a loud echo noise when you get on it. Then he started to use it and it tore. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rbay

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but arrived with a small rip in the fabric
customer_reviews.text: The product is great and it seems durable, but the fabric had a tear, on the edge by the frame. I needed it right away so there was no time for me to return it an wait for a new one. I'm not sure if this was returned by someone or if it was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this for my Gizmo he likes being off the ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this for my Gizmo he likes being off the ground. Now he’s on his own bed. Comes with cool carring case too. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Lie Flat
customer_reviews.text: I should have more thoroughly read other reviews before purchasing. It would not go flat. When unfolded, the bed remained domed in the middle making it unusable.. immediately returned it. If you get a flat one, it would be a great bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Large enough for Rat Terrier and still cozy ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Large enough for Rat Terrier and still cozy for the Yorkie too! Just as described. Good quality and love the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Harris

customer_reviews.title: Size as advertised is not true
customer_reviews.text: Just got the bed today. So far not impressed for what I need it for. I have an area measured out at exactly 49 inches. The stats show 48 inches. Thought it would fit perfect with a half inch to spare on both sides as advertised. Not true. The bed is actually about 51 inches so if you are a planner like me and think this will fit in a 48 inch area as advertised I would find a different bed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Elevated
customer_reviews.text: Well maybe once I get the floors all finished in the home she will like it better as it does tend to slip when she jumps off. Nothing to put together was a big thing for me too. I absolutely love how easy it is to move and haul as she stays as my home most days (with social distancing) and then at my parents home. They don't have a/c so thought this would benefit her down at their home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the cot is great, but I’m unable to bring it along with ...
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression the whole thing folded in half, not just the legs folding in. Either way, the cot is great, but I’m unable to bring it along with my service dog as I’d hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Kalin P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Mister destructor hasn't been able to hurt it, though he has certainly tried.
customer_reviews.author: spinner113

customer_reviews.title: Pet Cot Bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice pet cot - I like that's it's one piece and comes with a carrying bag. The pet cot is a little difficult to get into the carrying bag - but it goes in there.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Helmig

customer_reviews.title: Dog confused.
customer_reviews.text: Dog had a hard time figuring out what it was for originally but she now uses it easily and seems pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a long time to find a dog bed with collapsible legs. This one is pretty perfect to take in my car to dog classes. It easily folds flat and I love that it has its own carry bag. Just not sure how I'll clean it when it gets dirty. My dog loves it - relaxed on it easily. The bed has only a little give in it so it doesn't move when he jumps on it
customer_reviews.author: Twice the smiles

customer_reviews.title: Durability and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of unfolding and folding as well as the convenient storage bag with handles. The cot is sturdy enough for my 55+ lbs English Bulldog and light enough to move from one spot to another.
customer_reviews.author: ElisdeliaCoronado

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My miniature dachsund loves this bed, especially when living in tropical weather. Practical, easy to clean, well-made, sturdy. Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ira Morales Mickunas

customer_reviews.title: Pet perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this cot. He’s a big boy and it is plenty large enough for him to rest. Like the idea that it folds and can easily be stored.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Very slippery, should have better traction for the paws
customer_reviews.text: Frame seems strong enough but the bed itself seems a little flimsy and is very slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: ready to use right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Order received timely and ready to use right out of the box. no assembly required. made well and fits my two 25 lb Boston Terriers comfortably. They took to it right away. we are waiting for some sunny days to give more use.
customer_reviews.author: christine sperounis

customer_reviews.title: The size is a lot smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the large foldable raised bed for our 68 lb dog. It was too small, it wasn’t sturdy, it wasn’t secured in the carrying case and a little heavy for transporting. We returned it. We purchased a less expensive one that made all of our dog needs.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Penn

customer_reviews.title: Great Elevated Area for 6 Pound Malteese
customer_reviews.text: No assembly required. Folds up/Unfolds easy. Heidi Claire ( I declare) loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: This item keeps him off of cold floors and when it's hot it'll keep him cooler
customer_reviews.text: Our six month old puppy loves this... once we put it on our Lanai he immediately went on it and he loves to lay in the sun all day on this...highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: CC in Florida

customer_reviews.title: He runs and jumps on it when playing and it remains stable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for training my English Springer Spaniel to stay in one place outside my kitchen. It is large enough for him to lie on it. It is sturdy. It appears light enough to carry although I have not tried to do so.
customer_reviews.author: BZwoman

customer_reviews.title: Great cot for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cot for my dog. It comes with a carrying case which is convenient. And it is reasonably priced. My dog jumped up on it right away.
customer_reviews.author: mama dog

customer_reviews.title: Carrying case is as big as the cot
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be fooled by the size of the picture. The carrying bag is just as big as the actual cot itself. However that’s totally my fault as I should’ve looked closer. Storing and carrying it will be quite bulky so we’ll rest it it on our upcoming road trip. I did notice that when our pup initially tried to jump on it, he put too much weight on one side and it almost flipped over. It’s decent for a cot though I wish it could fold one more time in the middle for easier storage and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My dog took his time to get used to it but it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: GIANLUCA

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, no assembly needed.
customer_reviews.text: Got it so my dog could sit and lay off the cement on my patio. Works great light weight and no assembly was needed. Well made and sturdy. Does not slip or creep.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Product matched ordering details/information
customer_reviews.text: My 72# dog loves his new cot and started using it moments after I unpacked it. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Its awesome
customer_reviews.text: This pet cot has so many great features! It is made out of super strong material, no assembly needed, and comes with a carry bag. My dog absolutely loves it and I’m really glad I chose this pet cot.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy Folding Dog Cot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this folding cot for my 60 pound Standard Poodle. When I presented it to him, he IMMEDIATELY jumped up on it and settled in while I tended to my garden. It’s so much easier to use than typical ones- fully assembled and compact when folded to slip back unto the handy carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: BetsyN

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but very sturdy construction.  No assembly and easily portable.
customer_reviews.text: Our 115 pound lab mix LOVES his new bed. Took it out of the package and he knew immediately it was for him and he stayed on it for 2 hours. He now spends many hours on it every day. No assembly and so easy to pack up for the camper. Very sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Hufford

customer_reviews.title: Great dog/ pet cot
customer_reviews.text: Great pet cot. Folds great and Comes with neat bag to travel with. Good buy ave value for the quality. Excellent seller, and communicator. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ELI Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the extra money compared to other cots. Narrow and not as comfy for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: My ten week lab pup luvs it, has tried but can’t chew the cover. Lightweight for moving around. Use it outside on a patio, water beaded up when it rained easily shaken off. It is a year later and bought the larger size- still living it
customer_reviews.author: youngpen

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The material is really poor quality. My dogs nails that I keep trimmed have already torn and poked holes through it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Ripped!!
customer_reviews.text: Dog loved this cot, used it alot, ripped within 3 weeks in several places. Not for use in sun, less than 70 degrees so not direct sunlight but faded badly and had to toss.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product as stated.... Doggies love it !!! The rest is history !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: The pet bed is very sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: The pet bed is very sturdy and well built. I like the part that it folds up for easy storage and transport. It will hold my 60 lb. Weim just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like the locking legs since the two dogs I have ...
customer_reviews.text: solid cot, like the locking legs since the two dogs I have get rowdy at times
customer_reviews.author: Kip

product_meta.title: GigaTent Elevated Pet Cot with Steel Frame - Foldable Raised Comfortable Lightweight Durable Disassemble Play and Rest Portable Pet Bed for Dogs and Cats
product_meta.description:
Size:Large - 42" x 24" x 8"| Color:BlackProtect your pet from harsh temperatures and fleas with the elevated pet cot by GigaTent.

Typical pet beds go directly on the ground exposing your pet to insects, dirt, health problems and uncomfortable surface temperatures. An elevated construction keeps your furry friend away from hot or freezing; hard or wet surfaces and insects like fleas and ticks. It also allows cool air to flow underneath them and it provides protection for their bones and joints.

This cot is constructed from a strong fabric and U-shaped legs that evenly distributes weight to keep your pet comfortable. Keep your pet cozy, cool and above the ground so they’ll sleep just as good as you do. Use it indoors or outdoors, it’s easy to fold and comes with a resistant storage bag that features two side handles that make it easy to carry anywhere - take it to the park or a friend's house! Now your pets can rest in peace and harmony!

PRODUCT FEATURES

 Elevated Pet Cot
Folds in Half
Includes Bonus Storage Bag
Heavy Duty Polyester 
Steel Frame
No Assembly Required
Holds up to 100lbs
Large Dimensions: 42” x 24” x 8” (folds to 5.5”)
Small Dimensions: 35” x 24” x 8” (Folds to 3”)

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL

This cot is easily transportable, you can take it with you virtually anywhere. It is perfect for indoor and outdoor use, and assembles in just one step. Quickly move your cat or dog from room to room or from inside to outside, no matter where you go they’ll always have the perfect place to cuddle up or relax. It’s great for cats and dogs! 

THE GIGATENT PROMISE

GigaTent is dedicated to providing the highest quality products along with the highest caliber customer service. We are ready and waiting to assist you with any questions or issues you may have and ensure your complete satisfaction.
feature_bullets: ELEVATED: An 8" raised bed keeps your pet off hot, cold, uncomfortable and dirty floors and surfaces to keep them comfortable and clean as they lounge or rest.
HEAVY DUTY & DURABLE: Made with a tubular steel frame and durable polyester, this dog bed can hold up to 100lbs, and is perfect for indoor and outdoor use.
STRONG & STURDY: The U-shaped legs distribute weight evenly to provide maximum support and ensure stability and balance. This bed won't flip over or beak.
TRANSPORTABLE & STORABLE: The legs fold in half for easy and compact storage or transport. It also comes with a bonus heavy-duty storage bag for travel.

EASY & SIMPLE: The pet cot arrives with no assembly required, just unfold and it is ready to use. The fabric is easy to wipe clean or wash for simple maintenance. SLEEP WELL: Dogs may need to be taught to rest on the cot, as unacquainted pets may view it as a toy to chew on.
